verses.roman:
'gata-varṣa pauṣe more karāila bhojana
kabhu nāhi khāi aiche miṣṭānna-vyañjana'

synonyms: gata-varṣa—last year; pauṣe—in the month of Pauṣa (December-January); more—unto Me; karāila bhojana—offered many foodstuffs; kabhu nāhi khāi—I never tasted; aiche—such; miṣṭānna—sweetmeats; vyañjana—vegetables.
translation: The Lord said, "Last year in the month of Pauṣa, when Nṛsiṁhānanda gave me varieties of sweetmeats and vegetables to eat, they were so good that I had never before eaten such preparations."
